page.title: 10Medway Hospital
page.content: Medway Hospital is within five minutes walk from our school. It is a major accident and general hospital. Medway Hospital is important because you need it when you are hurt or need treatment. Medway Hospital is important to me because when my dad had a brain haemorhage he went there for some time. I live oposite it so when my sister had a broken arm she did not have to go far. There are loads of places in hospitals. For instance a waiting room, casualty wards, operating theatres, kitchens, private rooms, laundry, pharmacy, teaching room, childrens ward, mens and womens wards.
